src: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
mt: "Kita kiwari ngahaja 4 bulan anu kelirna tikus anu teu diabetes anu saméméhna teu diabetes," dia ngaboga.
ref: Urang ayeuna ngagaduhan beurit umur 4-bulan anu anjeunna ngagaduhan diabetes ayeuna atos henteu diabetes," Tambahan Anjeunna.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor kedokteran ti Dalhousie University di Halifax, Nova Scotia sareng ketua divisi klinis sareng ilmiah ti Asosiasi Diabetes Kanada ngabédakeun yen penelitian éta masih dina tahap awal.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, profésor bidang kedokteran di Universitas Dalhousie di Halifax, Nova Scotia sareng ketua divisi klinis sareng ilmiah ti Asosiasi Diabétés Kanada ngingetkeun yén panalungtikan ieu karék permulaan hungkul.

src: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
mt: Seperti para ahli séjénna, éta nyaritakeun manéhna skeptis ngeunaan apakah diabetes bisa diobati, ngabéakna hasil éta teu ngarungkak pikeun jalma-jalma anu geus ngalaman diabetes tipe 1.
ref: Sapertos sababaraha ahli anu sanés, anjeunna henteu percanteun upami diabétés tiasa disembuhkeun, kusabab pamanggihan ieu téh henteu aya hubunganana jeung jalma anu parantos gaduh diabétés tipe 1.

src: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
mt: Dina dinten Senen, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanen ti Nobel Komite Literatur di Akademi Swedia, ngumumkeun umum di program radio di Sveriges Radio di Swedia, komite, teu bisa nyampekeun Bob Dylan langsung ngeunaan pikeun ngabéntangan 2016 Nobel Hadiah di Literatur, geus ngabéntangan usahana pikeun nyampekeunna.
ref: Dinten Senén, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén Komite Nobel pikeun Sastra di Akademi Swedia, umum diumumkeun salila hiji program radio dina Sveriges Radio di Swedia nu panitia, teu tiasa ngahontal langsung Bob Dylan ngeunaan unggul 2016 Nobel Prize dina karya Sastra, geus ditinggalkeun usaha anak pikeun ngahontal manéhna.

src: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
mt: Danius ngomong, "Sekarang kana kami teu ngalakukeun apa-apa. Saya ngajak sareng ngirim email ka kolaborator paling deukeutna sareng menerima balik balik anu ramah. Saat kiye, ieu téh teuas aya deui."
ref: Danius nyarios, "Ayeuna urang henteu ngalakukeun nanaon. Abdi parantos nelepon jeung ngirim surél ka kolaborator anu pangdeketna jeung anjeunna sareng waleranna téh soméah pisan. Kanggo ayeuna, éta cekap."

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
mt: Sejénna, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyaritake perusahaan éta mimiti ngadeg nalika kunci pintu téh teu bisa didengar tina toko anu di garagenna.
ref: Sateuacanna, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyarios yén perusahaanna dimimitian nalika bel pantona téh teu tiasa kadangu ti tokona dina garasina.

src: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
mt: Manéhna ngadamel pintu WiFi, manéhna ngomongkeun.
ref: Anjeunna ngawangun bél panto anu nyambung ka WiFi, ceunah mah.

src: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
mt: Siminoff ngomongkeun penjualan na tiasa ditingkatkeun tina tampilna dina episode 2013 Shark Tank, anu panelna ngabatolkeun péréntah pikeun startup éta.
ref: Siminoff ngomong penjualan meningkat sanggeus penampilanna di 2013 di episode Shark Tank di manten panel pintonan nampik ngadanaan startup.

src: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
mt: Dina akhir 2017, Siminoff tampil di kanal televisi QVC.
ref: Dina ahir 2017, Siminoff téh muncul dina saluran balanja tipi QVC.

src: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring ogé ngejalankeun kasus jeung perusahaan keamanan séjén, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring ogé mereskeun gugatan hukum sareng perusahaan keamanan saingan, ADT Corporation.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
mt: Salah sahiji vaksin eksperimental tiasa ngurangkeun mortalitas Ebola, nepi ka kiwari, teu aya obat anu jelas bisa dipaké pikeun ngubaran inféksi anu aya.
ref: Sanaos aya hiji vaksin hasil ékspérimen anu mungkin bakal tiasa ngirangan jumlah korban jiwa akibat ebola, tapi dugi ka kiwari, teu acan aya landong anu jelas kabuktosan tiasa ngalandongan inféksina.

src: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
mt: Satu cocktail antarotid, ZMapp, mimiti ngalaman pangaruh dina lapangan, tapi studi formal ngalirikeun yén manfaatna leuwih keur ngahambat kematian.
ref: Hiji koktail antibodi, ZMapp, mimitina katingali ngajanjikeun di lapangan, nanging studi resmi nunjukkeun yén manpaatna langkung alit tibatan anu dipilarian, nyaéta nyegah pati.

src: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Dina uji coba PALM, ZMapp dipaké minangka kontrol, anu hartina para ilmuan ngagunakeun éta minangka patokan sareng ngabandingkeun tiga perlakuan séjénna ka éta.
ref: Dina tés PALM, ZMapp lalakon salaku kontrol, anu hartosna élmuwan nganggo éta salaku titik awal pikeun ngabandingkeun tilu parawatan sanés.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
mt: USA Gymnastics ngabutuhkeun surat ti Komite Olimpiade Amerika jeung menerima kebutuhan mutlak ti keluarga Olimpiade pikeun ngamimitian lingkungan anu aman pikeun kabéh atlitna.
ref: Kelompok Senam USA ngadukung surat Komite Olimpiade Amérika Serikat sareng narima sagala kabutuhan keur kaluwargi Olimpiade supados tiasa ngapromosikeun lingkungan nu aman keur atlet urang sadaya.

src: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
mt: Kami setuju jeung pernyataan USOC anu nyaritakeun yén minat kami jeung klub kami, sareng olahraga kami, mungkin dipelihara leuwih baik ku ngalangkah deui jeung perubahan boga arti di dalam organisasi kami, alih-alih decertification.
ref: Urang satuju sareng pernyataan USOC téh kapentingan atlit sareng klub urang, sareng olahragana, tiasa langkung saé kalayan maju jeung parobahan anu berarti di organisasi urang, tibatan penghapusan sértipikasi.

src: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
mt: USA Gymnastics ngahimpikeun pamariksaan independen anu tiasa ngabuktikeun bagaimana panyakitna anu disebutkeun ku para korban Larry Nassar bisa teu di detéksi pikeun waktu nu lama sareng ngahimpikeun perubahan anu perlu sareng anu pangabutuhna.
ref: Organisasi Senam USA ngadukung panyilidikan mandiri anu tiasa nyorot soal panyalahgunaan proporsi anu digambarkeun ku wantunna ku para penyintas Larry Nassar nepi ka teu kanyahoan sakitu lami sareng mencakup parobahan anu sesuai sareng diperlukeun.

src: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA Gymnastics sareng USOC geus mibanda tujuan anu sarua — ngagunakeun olahraga gimnastik, sareng séjénna, anu aman sababna para atlet tiasa ngalakonkeun mimpi-mimpi anu aman, positif sareng berdaya.
ref: Organisasi Senam Nasional AS sareng USOC gaduh tujuan anu sami - ngusahakeun olahraga senam, sareng sajabana, saaman mungkin pikeun atlit nuturkeun impianna di lingkungan anu aman, positip sareng diberdayakeun.

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
mt: Brzezinski bekerja pikeun John F. Kennedy minangka penasehat sareng pikeun administrasi Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Salami taun 1960an, Brzezinski damel kanggo John F. Kennedy salaku panaséhatna teras salajengna salaku pagawé administrasi kanggo Lyndon B. Johnson.

src: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
mt: Salila pilihan 1976 éta manah Carter ngeunaan kebijakan luar negeri, sareng manah keamanan nasional (NSA) ti 1977 nepi ka 1981, ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger.
ref: Dina pemilihan taun 1976 anjeunna jadi penasehat Carter dina urusan kabijakan luar negeri, teras salajengna ngawula salaku National Security Advisor (NSA) ti taun 1977 nepi ka taun 1981,  ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger.

src: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: Salaku NSA, éta nyadiakeun bantuan ka Carter dina ngalakukeun hubungan diplomatik jeung urang-urang, saperti Camp David Accords, 1978; normalisasi hubungan AS-Tiongkok dina akhir 1970-an; Révolusi Iran, anu ngabalukarkeun krisis tahanan Iran, 1979; sareng invasi Soviet di Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Salaku NSA, anjeunna ngabantos Carter nguruskeun urusan hubungan diplomatis dunya, sapertos Camp David Accords, 1978; nganormalkeun hubungan AS-China dina akhir 1970an; Revolusi Iran, nu nyababkeun krisis penyanderaan Iran, 1979; sareng invasi Soviet di Afganistan, 1979.

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
mt: Film éta, anu ngamék Ryan Gosling sareng Emma Stone, menerima nominasi dina kategori-kategori utama.
ref: Film anu dibintangan ku Ryan Gosling jeung Emma Stone narima nominasi di babaraha kategori utama.

src: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
mt: Gosling sareng Stone méré nominasi pikeun Aktor sareng Aktris masing-masing.
ref: Gosling sareng Stone masing-masing janten aktor sareng aktris terbaik.

src: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
mt: Nomine séjénna nyaéta Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: Nominasi séjén kaasup Pilem Panghadéna, Sutradara, Sinématografi, Rarancang Kostum, Pangropéa Pilem, Penata Musik, Rarancang Produksi, Pangropéa Sora, Adumanis Sora sarta Skénario Asli.

src: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Du lagu ti film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) sareng City of Stars, méré nominasi pikeun lagu asli anu pangalusna. Studio Lionsgate méré 26 nominasi — leuwih ti studio anu saeutikna.
ref: 2 lagu tina filem, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) jeung City of Stars, meunang nominasi keur lagu asli nu pang alusna. Lionsgate Studio meunang 26 nominasi -- langkung ti studio nu lian na.

src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
mt: Kadua dina, Donald Trump, présidén AS, ngumumkeun dina pernyataan anu disampaan ku sekretaris pers, yén pasukan AS bakal leupas ti Suriah.
ref: Dinten Minggon siang, Presiden Amérika Donald Trump dina kalimah pernyataan nu dikintunkeun ku sekretarisna, nyarios yén tentara Amérika bakal ninggalkeun Syria.

src: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: Kabar éta diumumkeun sanggeus Trump ngalakukeun telepon jeung Presiden Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: Pengumuman éta dicarioskeun saatos Trump nelpon présidén Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Turki ogé bakal ngabagi tugas ngawal para pejuang ISIS anu ditangkep, anu, pernyataan éta ngomong, negara-negara Eropa geus nolak ngabali.
ref: Turki ogé bakal ngurus pejuang ISIS anu ditangkep, saur pernyataan éta, nagara -nagara Éropa parantos nampik pikeun dibalikkeun.

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
mt: Éta teu ngan nangtukeun yen saeutikna dinosaurus ngarandam bulu, teori anu geus umum, tapi nyadiakeun rincian fosil umumna teu tiasa, saperti warna sareng aranjeuman tiga dimensi.
ref: Hal iyeu teu ngan mastikeun lamun aya sababaraha dinosaurus anu boga bulu, hiji teori anu geus nyebar, tapi teu tiasa nunjukeun detail fosil anu cukup, siga warna jeung susunan 3 dimensina.

src: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
mt: Ilmuan ngomongkeun anu warna bulu éta nyaéta cokelat di bagian atos sareng bagian bawahna warna pucat atawa warna carotenoid.
ref: Élmuwan nyatakeun yén bulu sato éta luhurna coklat kastanye nanging bagéan handapna pias atanapi karotenoid.

src: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
mt: Kaputusan éta ogé ngabuktikeun évolusi bulu di burung.
ref: Pendakan éta masihan wawasan dina parobahan bulu-bulu manuk.

src: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
mt: Kabéh bulu dinosaurus éta teu mibanda rachis nu boga pambangunan nu luhur, tapi mibanda bulu séjénna — barbs sareng barbules — para peneliti ngarasa rachis éta tiasa jadi pambangunan évolusi anu datang ngeunaan bulu éta.
ref: Kusabab bulu dinosaurus henteu gaduh poros anu saé perkembanganana, anu disebut rachis, tapi gaduh ciri-ciri bulu sanesna - cucuk sareng barbules - panaliti nyimpulkeun yén rachis sigana mah hasil tina épolusi langkung ahir tibatan ciri-ciri nu lainna.

src: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Struktur bulu éta nyaritakeun yen bulu éta teu dipaké dina penerbangan tapi pikeun ngatur suhu atawa pikeun ngagambarkeun. Para peneliti nyaritakeun yen, walaupun éta nyaéta ekor dinosaurus nu muda, sampel éta ngagambarkeun bulu dewasa sareng teu bulu anak.
ref: Struktur bulu na nunjukkeun yén éta henteu dianggo kanggo hiber tapi pikeun ngaturan suhu atanapi tampilan. Panalungtik ngusulkeun yén, sanaos ieu buntut dinosaurus anu ngora, conto ieu nunjukkeun bulu anu déwasa sanés bulu hayam.

src: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Para peneliti méré saran anu, walaupun ieu nyaéta ekor dinosaurus muda, sampelna ngagambarkeun bulu dewasa jeung teu bulu anak.
ref: Para peneliti mikeun gambaran yen, sanaos ieu teh buntut dinosaurus anom, sampel nembongkeun bulu sawawa sarta sanes anak.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
mt: Kapal bom mobil meledug di kantor polisi di Gaziantep, Turki dina pagi hari tadi, nu ngabalukarkeun dua polisi tewas sareng lapan puluh dua jalma lianna ngalaman luka.
ref: Hiji bom mobil diledakeun dina markas pulisi di Gaziantep, Turki kamari isuk, maehan 2 patugas pulisi sareng nyilakakeun langkung ti duapuluh jalmi nu sanes.

src: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
mt: Kantor gubernur ngomongkeun 19 tina lalakon anu luka polisi.
ref: Kantor gubernur nyatakeun salapan belas jalmi anu cidera téh nyaéta aparat pulisi.

src: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
mt: Polisi ngomong yen mérékeun anu disangka militant Daesh (ISIL) tiasa jadi tukang ngalakukeun serangan éta.
ref: Polisi nyarios aranjeunna curiga ka tersangka militan Daesh (ISIL) anu bertanggung jawab dina serangan éta.

src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
mt: Kabéh bintang di sistem éta katempo ngalakonan prinsip dasar anu sarua: Aktivitas bintang-bintang di sistem éta katempo dipicu ku luminositasna, rotasina, sareng tiap hal anu séjén.
ref: Aranjeuna manggihan lamun matahari beroperasi numutkeun prinsip anu sami sareng bentang anu sanes; Aktifitas kabeh bentang dina sistem kapendak didorong ku cahayana, rotasina sorangan, eta hungkul.

src: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
mt: Kabiasaan sareng rotasi dipakékeun sababaraha pikeun ngabédakeun nomer Rossby, anu patali jeung aliran plasma.
ref: Luminositas sareng rotasi dianggo pikeun nangtukeun nomor bintang Rossby , anu nyambung jeung aliran plasma.

src: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
mt: Numutkeun Rossby number, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener, bener-bener
ref: Beuki leutik bilangan Rossby-na, beuki kurang aktif béntangna nu patali jeung pembalikan magnétna.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
mt: Salila perjalanan éta, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah di tempat-tempat anu béda-béda.
ref: Salila perjalanan na, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah dina seueur waktosna.

src: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
mt: Anjeunna diserang ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing rabies di Tibet, kabur nikah di Nepal sareng ditangkeun di India.
ref: Anjeunna dirampok ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing anu gélo di Tibet, kabur ti pernikahan di Nepal jeung ditangkep di India.

src: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
mt: Standar 802.11n ngalakukeunna di frekuensi 2.4Ghz sareng 5.0Ghz.
ref: 802.11 anu standar tiasa beroprasi dina frékuénsi 2.4 Ghz atawa 5.0 Ghz.

src: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
mt: Kabéh ieu tiasa ngahubungkeun jeung 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, asal stasiun panghubungna ngahiji dua radio.
ref: Ieu bakal ngijinkeun éta ngabalik sareng bisa kangge 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, upami stasiun utamana ngagaduhan dua radio.

src: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
mt: Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih luhur ti anu dipaké ku para pendahulu, maksimum teori tina 600Mbit/s.
ref: Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih tereh tibatan pangheulana jeung hasil teoritis maksimum 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
mt: Duval, anu geus nikah sareng dua anak dewasa, teu ngalakukeun jeung Miller, anu ngalaporkeun kana kisahna.
ref: Duvall, anu tos nikah sareng gaduh dua murangkalih nu tos ageung, henteu ninggalkeun kesan anu saé ka Miller, anu patali sareng carita éta.

src: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
mt: Kapada pamintalan, Miller ngomong, "Mike ngomong deui dina dengdeng...Aku ngaganggu pikeun nyiapkeun diri, jadi teu kawasna anu ngomongna."
ref: Waktos diménta koméntar, Miller nyarios "Mike seueur nyarios keur sidang lumangsung... Abdi nuju siap-siap janten abdi heunteu ngadangukeun naon anu anjeunna omongkeun."

src: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
mt: "Kami bakal ngalakukeun pikeun ngurangkeun emisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu nyata ku 2020 ti tingkat 2005," Hu ngomong.
ref: Kami bakal milarian cara ngirangan émisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu signifikan di 2020 ti tingkat 2005," saur Hu.

src: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
mt: Éta teu ngabédakeun angka pikeun pambabaran, ngarungkakna anu bakal dipakékeun di dasar tina hasil ekonomi Cina.
ref: Anjeunna henteu netepkeun angka pikeun pemotongan éta, nyarios bahwa éta bade didamel dumasar tina hasil ekonomi Tiongkok.

src: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
mt: Hu ngomongkeun ka negara-negara nu sedeng "panggihkeun jalur lama tina polusi sareng ngebersihan ngeunaan."
ref: Hu ngadesek nagara-nagara berkembang "pikeun nyingkahan jalan pencemaran udara anu lami sareng ngabersihan engkéna."

src: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
mt: Éta ditambahkeun yen "merekeh tiasa teu, tapi, diharapkeun tiasa ditanyakeun tugas anu teu leuwih jauh ti tahapan, tanggung jawab sareng kapabilitasna."
ref: Anjeunna nambahan bahwasana "aranjeunna henteu kedah ditaros nyandak kawajiban saluareun tahap kamekaran, tanggung jawab sareng kamampuan aranjeunna."

src: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
mt: Grup studi Iraq ngababarkeun laporanna di jam 12.00 GMT dina poé éta.
ref: Kelompok Diajar Iraq maparkeun laporana tabuh 12.00 GMT dinten ieu.

src: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
mt: Éta ngabogaan yén tiap-tiap tindakan di Irak dina titik ieu tiasa ngahambat perang agama, tumbuha tina kekerasan, atawa jatuh ka kacauan.
ref: Ieu ngingetkeun yén teu aya 1 pun anu tiasa ngajamin yén tindakan di Irak dina waktos ayeuna bakal ngeureunkeun perang sekte, ningkatna kakerasan, atanapi ngageser kana huru hara.

src: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
mt: Raport éta dipanggihkeun ku pangajén pikeun ngadébatkeun bébas sareng ngadegkeun consensus di Amerika Serikat ngeunaan palitan ka Middle East.
ref: Laporan eta diawalan ku nyuhungkeun debat terbuka jeung formasi konsensus dina United States ngeunaan kebijakan keur Timur Tengah.

src: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
mt: Raport éta ngalaman kritik ka hampir kabéh aspek tina kebijakan préséntasi ti Éksekutip ngalih ka Irak sareng ngajak pikeun perubahan arah anu seger.
ref: Laporan éta kritis pisan ti hampir sadaya aspék ngeunaan kebijakan ti Eksekutif ka Irak jeung ngabutuhkeun perubahan arah anu geura.

src: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
mt: Salah satengah 78 rekomendasi éta nyaéta yen diplomasi anyar tiasa dijalana saméméh akhir taun ieu pikeun nyegah intervensi tina nagara-nagara anu ngalawan sareng pikeun ngabangun diplomasi jeung tetanggana.
ref: Salah sahiji ti 78 rékoméndasina nyaéta inisiatip diplomatik kedah dilaksanakeun saméméh akhir taun kanggo ngamankeun perwatesan Iraq ti serangan musuh sareng mulai deui hubungan diplomatik sareng nagara tatangga.

src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
mt: Senator jeung Ibu Perdana Menteri Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngabéntangan kandidat présidennana dina malam hari di La Plata, hiji kota 50 kilometer (31 mil) tina Buenos Aires.
ref: Senator ayeuna sarta Ibu Nagara Argéntina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumkeun pencalonana minangka présidén kamari wengi di La Plata, hiji dayeuh 50 kilométer (31 mil) ti Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner ngabéntangan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeunaan ngeuna
ref: Ny. Kirchner ngumumkeun niatna pikeun nyalonkeun janten présidén di Téater Argéntina, lokasi anu sami pas anjeunna ngamimitian kampanye Sénat taun 2005 salaku anggota délégasi propinsi Buénos Airés.

src: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
mt: Debat éta dipicu ku kontroversi ngeunaan pemasukan pikeun panyaluran sareng panyambungan di New Orleans tina hurikén Katrina; anu dipikawanoh ku konservatif fiskal anu humoris nyaéta "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: Debat éta dipicu ku kontrovérsi kusabab kaleuleuwihan dina pamakéan biaya keur bantosan jeung rékonstruksi saatos Badai Katrina; anu sababaraha jalmi konsérvatif fiskal téh nyebatkeunna "Kasepakatan Bush di New Orleans".

src: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
mt: Kritik liberal ngeunaan upaya rékonstruksi ngahasilkeun fokus ngeunaan pemberian kontrak rékonstruksi ka para pejabat Washington nu dipandangkeun.
ref: Kritik liberal dina upaya rékonstruksi atos mokuskeun dina masihan kontrak rékonstruksi pikeun warga lokal Washington anu diaku.

src: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
mt: Leuwih ti opat juta urang datang ka Roma pikeun ngadatangkeun pamakaman.
ref: Langkung ti 4 juta urang angkat ka Roma pikeun ngadatangan pamakaman

src: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
mt: Jumlah jalma anu hadir teu bisa dipungkasi, nu nyababkeun jalma-jalma teu bisa masuk ka liang liu di lapangan St. Peter.
ref: Jumlah jalmi nu dongkap seueur pisan matak teu sadayana tiasa lebet ka astana di St. Peter's Square.

src: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
mt: Beberapa layar televisi gedé dipasang di tempat-tempat di Roma pikeun ngalakukeun jalma-jalma nonton upacara éta.
ref: Sababaraha tipi ageung dipasang di sababaraha tempat di Roma supados warga tiasa nyaksian upacara éta.

src: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
mt: Di kota-kota séjén di Italia sareng di sakabéh dunya, khususna di Polandia, setup séjénna ogé dijieun, anu ditungtungkeun ku jumlah lalaki nu leuwih gedé.
ref: Di seueur dayeuh sanes di Italia sarta di sakumna dunya, utamana di Polandia, pangaturan sarupa didamel, anu tos ditingali ku seueur jalmi.

src: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
mt: Sejarahwan ngalaporkeun yen kebijakan FBI leuwih dahar ngalakonan kasus anu tiasa diselesaikan, khususna kasus mobil tawar, anu tujuan éta pikeun nambah angka keberhasilan.
ref: Sejarawan ngritik kabijakan FBI anu kapengker anu mokuskeun dina kasus anu gampil dibéréskeun, khususna kasus maling mobil, anu dimaksudkeun keur ningkatkeun tingkat kasuksesan agensi.

src: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
mt: Kongres mulai ngasupkeun anggaran pikeun inisiatif obscenity dina taun 2005 sareng ngasumsi FBI ngagunakeun 10 agén pikeun pornografi dewasa.
ref: Kongres mimiti ngabiayaan inisiatif ngeunaan tindakan nu jorang dina fiskal 2005 sareng nyatakeun yén FBI kedah ngayogikeun 10 agén kana pornografi sawawa.

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
mt: Robin Uthappa ngahasilkeun skor pangalusna, 70 run dina 41 bola ku ngabentur 11 empat sareng 2 enam.
ref: Robin Uthappa ngadamel skor babak anu pangluhurna, 70 runs ku ngan 41 bal ku neunggeul 11 opat poin sareng 2 genep poin.

src: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
mt: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, ngahasilkeun kumpulan 100 run.
ref: Panakol kriket pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, nampilkeun permaenan anu sae sareng nyetak saratus angka ku duaan.

src: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
mt: Kecapéan kapal India, India ngalakukeun 36 run, kecapéan 7 wicket, pikeun ngabubarkeun inningna.
ref: Tapi, saprak éléh kaptén wicket India ngan nyieun 36 lumpatan, éléh 7 wicket pikeun ngeureunkeun babak.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
mt: Presiden AS George W. Bush tiba di Singapura dina pagawéan 16 Nopémber, ngahasilkeun turun kana Asia pikeun sababaraha minggu.
ref: Présidén Amérika Serikat George W. Bush sumping di Singapura subuh kaping 16 Nopémber, mimitian wisata saminggu anjeunna di Asia.

src: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Éta diresmikeun ku Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng sareng ngadangkeun masalah dagang sareng pamaréntahan Singapura Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: Anjeuna di tampi ku Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng teras ngadiskusikeun isu perdagangan sareng térorisme babarengan Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong.

src: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Sabada hiji minggu keur kalahna dina pilihan umum tengah, Bush ngomong ka hiji kumpulan patugas ngeunaan ékspansi dagang di Asia.
ref: Saatos saminggu éléh dina pertengahan pemilu, Bush ngomong ka panongton ngeunaan ékspansi dagang di Asia.

src: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
mt: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper ngabogaan pikeun nyerat undang-undang 'Clean Air Act' ka komite partéy anu kabéh pikeun review, sabada pertemuan 25 menit ka Jack Layton, pamimpin NDP, di PMO.
ref: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper parantos satuju keur ngirimkeun 'Clean Air Act' na pamaréntah ka komite kabéh partai keur dipariksa, sateuacanna bacaan kadua, saatos 25 menit rapat dinten salasa jeung ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO.

src: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
mt: Layton ngajak pikeun perubahan dina undang-undang lingkungan konservatif dina pertemuan jeung PM, ngajak pikeun "penulisan kembali jeung lengkap" undang-undang lingkungan partéy konservatif.
ref: Layton atos nyuhungkeun parobahan dina RUU lingkungan konsérvatif salami pasamoan kalawan PM, nyuhungkeun opiken "ditulis ulang sadayana teras lengkep" tina RUU lingkungan partai Konservatif.

src: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
mt: Ti saprak pamaréntah federal ngalakukeun pamegatana dana pikeun rumah sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamaréntah negara jeung bebrapa anggota parlemén federal ngalaporkeun ieu tindakan minangka stunts dina awal pikeun pamegatan pamaréntah federal nu bakal dipanggihkeun dina bulan November.
ref: Saprak Pamarentah Federal turun tangan kanggo nyokot alih ngadanaan Rumah Sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamarentah nagara haturan sarta sababaraha anggota parlemen federal atos wagel tindakan ieu minangka aksi dina bubuka pemilu federal anu bade disauran dina sasih Nopember.

src: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
mt: Kuasa menteri John Howard ngomong yen tindakan éta nyaéta pikeun ngabersihkeun fasilitas rumah sakit tina turunna kelasna ku pamaréntah Tasmania, ku ngabagi AUD$45 juta.
ref: Tapi Perdana Mentri John Howard nyarios  lamun tindakan éta téh ngan saukur keur ngalindungi pasilitas rumah sakit anu diturunkeun ku pamaréntah Tasmania, ku masihan tambahan 45 juta dollar Australia.

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
mt: Menurut bulletin terakhir, bacaan tinggi laut ngalirkeun yen tsunami dihasilkeun. Aya aktivitas tsunami nu jelas dicatat di dekat Pago Pago sareng Niue.
ref: Ceuk kalawarta anu paling anyar, pamacaan kadar cai laut ngabejaan aya tsunami. Aya sababaraha aktivitas tsunami leutik karekam di caket Pago Pago sareng Niue.

src: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
mt: Kabéh laporan ngeunaan kerusakan sareng luka-luka teu jelas, tapi listrik ngalaman gangguan, nu ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah Tonga teu bisa menerima peringatan tsunami anu diumumkeun ku PTWC.
ref: Teu aya karuksakan atawa cilaka anu gede dilaporkeun di Tonga, tapi listrik sementara teu aya, nu dilaporkeun jadi sabab aparat Tonga teu tiasa narima peringatan tsunami anu diterbitkeun ku PTWC.

src: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
mt: 14 sekolah di Hawaii nu lokasina di deukeut pantai tutup pikeun kabéh dinten Senen walaupun peringatan éta diangkat.
ref: Opat belas sakola di Hawaii anu aya di atanapi caket garis pantai ditutup dinten Rebo sanaos peringatanna tos dicabut.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
mt: Presiden AS George W. Bush ngabarikeun kabar éta.
ref: Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush ngabageakeun bewara éta.

src: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
mt: Gordon Johndroe, pamimpin umum Bush ngalarkeun "langkah nu jadi pikeun tujuan ngahapuskeun verifikasi nuklir di pulo Korea."
ref: Juru bicara Bush Gordon Johndroe nyebut yen jangji Korea Utara "lengkah anu mantep pikeun tujuan denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea anu bisa diverifikasi."

src: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
mt: Kabeh kabutuhan panyakit Atlantik, Subtropical Storm Jerry, ngahasilkeun di Atlantik Laut dina poé éta.
ref: Badai ka sapuluh nu dinamian di usum Badai Atlantik, Badai Subtropis Jerry, kabentuk di Samudra Atlantik dinten ieu.

src: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
mt: National Hurricane Center (NHC) ngomong yen Jerry teu ngarancang pikeun daratan.
ref: National Hurricane Center (NHC) nyebatkeun yén ayeuna mah Jerry téh geus lain ancaman deui pikeun daratan.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
mt: Korps U.S. Engineers ngéstimasi yen 6 inci hujan bisa ngarobekkeun bendungan anu sebelumna rusak.
ref: Korps insinyur A.S ngira-ngira curah hujan 6 inci tiasa nembus tanggul anu samemehna geus ruksak.

src: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
mt: Kabuyutan kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup kaasup ka
ref: Bangsal Kasalapan, anu ngalaman caah saluhur 20 suku salila Badai Katrina, ayeuna karendem cai saluhur cangkéng kusabab tanggul di deukeutna na ngaluap.

src: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
mt: Air ngalir kana bendungan dina bagian 100 kaki leuwih.
ref: Cai ngaleber dina tanggul dina bagian anu lebarna 100 kaki.

src: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
mt: Adam Cuerden, Administrator Commons, ngejelaskeun kagusna tina pambubaran ieu nalika diajarkeun Wikinews bulan lalu.
ref: Administrator Commons Adam Cuerden ngungkapkeun kakeselna kusabab omongan anjeunna ka Wikinews sasih kamari dihapus.

src: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
mt: "Anjeunna [Wales] ngarasaan anu ngarobah ieu téh pikeun alasan hukum. Anjeunna ogé ngarasaan anu ngarobah ieu téh pikeun ngabasaan anjeun, ti awal nepi ka ngarobah karya seni."
ref: Anjeuna [Wales] dasarna ngabohong ka urang ti awal. Kahiji, ngalakonan lamun iyeu teh keur alesan hukum. Kadua, pura-pura ngadangukeun urang, nepikeun ka waktos ngahapus karyana."

src: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
mt: Kagetan komunitas éta nyieun upaya pikeun nuliskeun kebijakan ngeunaan konten seks pikeun situs anu ngahost jutaan media bébas lisensi.
ref: Kakeheulan masarakat nu nyababkeun kana usaha ngajukeun draf kebijakan ngeunaan eusi seksual keur situs nu nyediakeun jutaan media berlisensi terbuka.

src: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: Karya anu dilakukeunna umumna teoretis, tapi programna ditulis pikeun ngamimitan observasi nu dilakukeunna ka galaksi Sagittarius.
ref: Padamelan nu rengse seuseueurna teori hungkul, tapi programna didamel pikeun simulasi panalitian anu dilakukeun ka galaksi Sagitarius.

src: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
mt: Efek anu tim éta geus ngalakonan pikeun ngabutuhkeun téh tiasa disababkeun ku gaya pasang surut antara materi gelap galaksi sareng materi gelap galaksi Bima Sakti.
ref: Éfék anu di téangan ku tim bakal disababkeun ku gaya pasang surut antara materi gelapna galaksi éta jeung materi gelapna Bima Sakti.

src: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Siga bulan anu ngerahkeun gaya tarik ka bumi, nyebabkeun pasang surut, kitu oge Bima Sakti ngerahkeun gaya ka galaksi Sagitarius.

src: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
mt: Para ilmuan tiasa ngabéakkeun yen materi gelap ngarandapan materi gelap anu sarua jeung materi biasa.
ref: Para élmuwan tiasa nyimpulkeun yén materi gelap méré pangaruh ka materi gelap nu lianna nganggo cara anu sami sapertos matéri biasa.

src: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
mt: Teori éta nyaritakeun yén panyakit gelap di sekeliling galaksi umumna lokasina di sekeliling galaksi dina hiji wadah, sareng dijieun tina banyakan partikel kecil.
ref: Teori ieu nyebutkeun yén seueurna matéri poék disakitaran galaksi téh aya disakitaran hiji galaksi dina bentuk buletan cahaya, teras kadamel tina seueur partikel leutik.

src: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
mt: Berita televisi ngalaporkeun asap putih tina pabrik éta.
ref: Laporan tipi nunjukeun haseup bodas asalna tina pépélakan.

src: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
mt: Otoritas lokal ngabari warga di sekitar pabrik pikeun tetep di rumah, ngabutkeun AC sareng teu nginum air minum.
ref: Aparat satempat tos miwarang wargi nu linggih di sakitaran pabrik pikeun cicing di jero imah, mareman ac, sareng teu eeut ti cai keran.

src: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
mt: Menurut agensi nuklir Jepang, radioaktif cesium sareng iodin geus diidentifikasi di pabrik éta.
ref: Numutkeun badan nuklir Jepang, cesium radioaktif sareng yodiumna parantos dipendakan dina pabrik.

src: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

ref: Pihak nu boga kawasa nganggap éta wadah anu keur nyimpen bahan bakar uranium di daérah éta tiasa waé geus retak jeung bocor.

src: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll ngadagangkeun Tuberkulosis Tahanan Déréngan Obat (XDR-TB) di wewengkon Afrika Kidul KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dokter Tony Moll manggihan panyakit Tuberkolosis anu tahan pisan kana landong (XDR-TB) di propinsi Kwazulu-Natal, Afrika Kidul.

src: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
mt: Dina wawancara, éta nyarios yén varian anyar éta "sangat sangat menakutkan sareng mengejutkan karena tingkat kematian yang sangat tinggi."
ref: Dina hiji wawancara, anjeunna nyebatkeun bentuk nu énggal téh"pikasieuneun pisan sareng mangkhawatirkeun kusabab angka mematikan na ageung."

src: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
mt: Dr. Moll ngarasa yén sababaraha pasien mungkin ngalaman panyakit ieu di rumah sakit, jeung paling saeutik dua nyaéta karyawan rumah sakit.
ref: Dr Moll nyangka sababaraha pasién panginten katularan panyakit éta teh di rumah sakit, sareng sahenteuna 2 nu katular téh nyaéta pagawé kaséhatan rumah sakit.
